video_identification.title: Competition for the Reconstruction of the Destroyed Palestinian Villages - Year 5

extracted_metadata.title: Competition for the Reconstruction of the Destroyed Palestinian Villages - Year 5
extracted_metadata.description: Palestine Land Society (PLS), UK, organized an annual competition to redesign destroyed Palestinian villages for their reconstruction on the same site. For the fifth year in a row, Palestinian architectural students in the final year of study in a recognized institution or university are hereby invited to a very exciting competition to build a peaceful and just Palestine. Prizes are waiting for the winners. For more details, please visit our website: www.plands.org/competition Or have a look here: https://www.callforproject.com/contes...
